title: Social Entrepreneurship Innovation Design Course: Strengthening Practical Competencies for Sustainable Development

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A course emphasizing the integration of in-service practitioners' work experiences with Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) project development.

learning_goals: Design at least one business model canvas for creating social value.
Conduct at least two social problem-solving simulations utilizing VR/AR technology.
Complete one collaborative project using open resources and interactive videos.
Measure sustainable social entrepreneurship competencies (self-management/leadership/social impact) using at least three assessment scales
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
